title: Ball Pit
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Aballpit/Ball_pit_orbs.png]]

Hello there. It is me. I loved [[*user oritiefling]]'s [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6059 SCP-6059], so I drew it! I had fun with this, although I definitely made some mistakes (such as trying to shade each individual ball).
[[/=]]
